oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of Tilmicosin on the Incidence of Bovine Respiratory Disease and Animal Performance When Used in Temperature-Based Therapy and Complete Metaphylaxis Treatment Programs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Guthrie, C. A.
Vogel, G. J.
Laudert, S. B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: metaphylactic treatment programs
temperature-based
bovine respiratory disease
morbidity
mortality
tilmicosin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two trials were conducted to evaluate the effects of tilmicosin (MicotilÂ® 300) on the incidence of morbidity and mortality due to bovine respiratory disease (BRD) when used in temperature-based and complete metaphylactic treatment programs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 134
